text: National Highway 647, commonly referred to as NH 647 is a national highway in India. It is a secondary route of primary National Highway 47. NH-647 runs in the state of Maharashtra in India. == Route == NH647 connects Arvi, Pimpalkuta, Kanrangna, Anji, Pavnar and Wardha in the state of Maharashtra. == Junctions == : Terminal near Arvi. : near Lonikand == See also == * List of National Highways in India * List of National Highways in India by state == References == == External links == * NH 647 on OpenStreetMap Category:National highways in India Category:National Highways in Maharashtra
title: National Highway 647 (India)
